original_text: I clothed you with an embroidered dress and put sandals of fine leather on you. I dressed you in fine linen and covered you with costly garments.
korean_text: 수 놓은 옷을 입히고 물돼지 가죽신을 신기고 가는 베로 두르고 모시로 덧입히고

sentences.original_text: I clothed you with an embroidered dress
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 자수 놓은 옷을 입혔다

sentences.original_text: and put sandals of fine leather on you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너에게 좋은 가죽 샌들을 신겼다

sentences.original_text: I dressed you in fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너에게 좋은 아마포 옷을 입혔다

sentences.original_text: and covered you with costly garments
